title: The Best Wireless Chargers For Your New Phone
description: Its been eight years since wireless charging first came to smartphones with the Palm Pre, but it took Apple building it into the iPhone 8 and iPhone X to make it matter to the mainstream. That's no snarky jab at Apple or its customers; in fact the iPhone's newfound embrace of wireless charging is reason to celebrate for all those who've ever known the joy of cutting the (charging) cord! That's because wireless charging is about to return to the scene in a big way  and this time, there's no pesky standards war to get in the way of progress. I'm MrMobile and heres what you need to know if youre treating your smartphones to a wireless charger in 2017.
